inclusion.criterion: opportunity to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: blood drawn and stored for measurement of Anti-TPO, Ca, PTH and inflammatory factors
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: chart review of preoperative thyroid U/S characteristics
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: postoperative histopathology evaluation by experienced pathologist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of Hashimoto's thyroiditis based on histopathology finding and AntiTPO level
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: histopathology criteria for Hashimoto's thyroiditis seen in normal region of thyroid gland
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: division into two groups: HT and control group
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all patients undergoing thyroidectomy for various indications at University of Texas Medical Branch in Galveston between June 2011-May 2012
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of previous radiotherapy to head and neck
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, meets inclusion criteria, does not have history of previous radiotherapy to head and neck or history of radioactive iodine therapy.
